rows.label: qev095803_MSG0001
rows.name: Welcome back! Glad to see you're in one piece.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095803_MSG0002
rows.name:
In some ways, you were up against even worse than
the Ganglion this time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095803_MSG0003
rows.name:
A device designed to grant us an understanding of
Mira's nature was destroyed by that very same nature![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095803_MSG0004
rows.name:
Yet we keep rejecting the natural order and instead 
persist in our own selfish agendas.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095803_MSG0005
rows.name:
*sigh* Sorry about that. I'm the one who threw all
of this onto youâ€”I'm the last one who should be
preaching about it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095803_JNK0010
rows.name: Sympathize

rows.label: qev095803_SEL0011
rows.name: Agree that killing the indigens felt terrible.

rows.label: qev095803_JNK0020
rows.name: Lecture

rows.label: qev095803_SEL0021
rows.name: Explain that there is no place for sentimentality on Mira.

rows.label: qev095803_MSG0006
rows.name:
Yeah, I suppose anything I could say would amount to
little more than a self-serving excuse, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095803_MSG0007
rows.name: But still, I can't hold you responsible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095803_MSG0008
rows.name:
You did your job, and I have no intention of judging
you for it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095803_MSG0009
rows.name:
You were a total pro out there, doing what had to be
done no matter how unpleasant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095803_MSG0011
rows.name: ...Yeah, you're right. That's probably a bit naive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095803_MSG0012
rows.name: Maybe I just don't have your grit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095803_MSG0013
rows.name:
Honestly, I kind of admire that about you.
You're a total pro out there, doing what has to be
done no matter how unpleasant it is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095803_MSG0014
rows.name:
When we first met, I told you I didn't begrudge you for
your success. Remember?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095803_MSG0015
rows.name: Well, it turns out that might not be exaaaactly...true.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095803_MSG0016
rows.name:
Being understaffed left me unable to do my job.
I felt frustrated from spinning my wheels and I
got bitter. ...Out of envy, I suppose.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095803_MSG0017
rows.name: It's just more proof that I have a lot of growing to do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095803_MSG0018
rows.name:
Hell, maybe I SHOULD view these staffing problems
as some kind of challenge to overcome.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095803_MSG0019
rows.name:
At the very least, it might help me open up this
narrow mind of mine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095803_MSG0020
rows.name:
So from now on, my team and I will strive to do
just that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095803_MSG0021
rows.name: I owe you a debt, I think.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095803_MSG0022
rows.name:
It was my own immaturity that brought the debt about.
I'll remember that in the future.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095803_MSG0023
rows.name:
Eventually I'll repay you, and maybe even become a
BLADE that I can be proud of.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095803_MSG0024
rows.name: Until then, be well.[ST:wait ]
